1554250.name: Schwarzerblitz - Merfight Collaboration Costume
1554250.description:
The Ocean shall be your grave!

Hide among the waves and strike in the shadows, with this official Drargos crossover costume from Merfight: Curse of the Arctic Prince! Skeleton dons Drargos skull mask and is ready to exact punishment on his unwitting opponents!

Important Note

To use this DLC costume, you need first to have unlocked Skeleton Skallen by either:
  • clearing the game's arcade mode with Mystery Johnson OR
  • answering YES to the initial "unlock all characters" prompt OR
  • clearing the story episode "Skeletons in the Closet" OR
  • using one of the cheat codes listed in the Discussion threads.
1554250.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
